VEvil.​Core.​SceneManagement.​SceneSystem
public static
VEvil.​Core.​SceneManagement.​SceneSystem

Provide the ability to load/unload scenes via SceneData files.

Variables
sceneDatas
private static List<SceneData> sceneDatas

List{T} of every SceneDatas files found upon initialization.

loadedScenes
private static Dictionary<SceneData, Scene> loadedScenes

Dictionary{TKey,TValue} of current loaded Scenes.

onSceneBeginLoading
private static Action<SceneData> onSceneBeginLoading

Invoked when a SceneData is about to be loaded.

Parameter
Arg 01

The SceneData that'll be loaded.

onSceneLoaded
private static Action<SceneData> onSceneLoaded

Invoked when a SceneData has been loaded.

onSceneLoadedEarly
private static Action<SceneData> onSceneLoadedEarly

Invoked before onSceneLoaded.

onActiveSceneChanged
private static Action<SceneData> onActiveSceneChanged

Invoked when the active scene has been changed.

Parameter
Arg 01

The SceneData file of the new scene currently active.</param

Functions
FirstInitializationPass
[RuntimeInitializeOnLoadMethod(RuntimeInitializeLoadType.AfterAssembliesLoaded)]
private static void FirstInitializationPass()

Initialize the SceneSystem's required content.

First Initialization Pass.  Called automatically at the RuntimeInitializeLoadType.SubsystemRegistration.

SecondInitializationPass
[RuntimeInitializeOnLoadMethod(RuntimeInitializeLoadType.BeforeSceneLoad)]
private static void SecondInitializationPass()

Second Initialization Pass.

Called automatically at the RuntimeInitializeLoadType.BeforeSceneLoad.  Register this first loaded Scene into the SceneSystem.

LoadSceneAsync
public static async Task LoadSceneAsync(
SceneData 
_data,
LoadSceneMode 
_loadMode
 = 
LoadSceneMode.Single
)

Load a Scene referenced in a SceneData file asynchronously in the background.

The new Scene loaded will automatically be the new active scene by default.

Parameters
_data
SceneData

The SceneData containing the Scene to load.

_loadMode
LoadSceneMode

The LoadSceneMode.
